meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Krista Cain Steve Mandella Nanette Wargo Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4004.

td.p: Krista Cain, an optician from Carrollton, Georgia
Steve Mandella, an assistant security manager originally from North Huntington, Pennsylvania
Nanette Wargo, a graduate student from Sauk Village, Illinois (whose 3-day cash winnings total $53,030)

tr.td: INTERNATIONAL AUTHORS
THE ROLE PLAYED
(Alex: We'll give you the actors; you identify the role they all played.)
THE 1880s
YIDDISH WORDS
PEOPLE
IT'S PARTY TIME!
